Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Stony Island
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, Jeffery and 75th, due to street blockage near 75th/Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Stony Island, 76th, Jeffery, then resume their normal route at 75th, due to street blockage near 75th/Stony Island.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #76 Diversey Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Diversey/Damen
ShortDescription: EB 76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Damen, Fullerton, Ashland & Diversey, due to street blockage near Diversey/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #76 Diversey buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Damen, Fullerton, Ashland, and resume their normal route on Diversey, due to street blockage near Diversey/Damen.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
